titles.title: To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require improved disclosure of corporate charitable contributions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Finance and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 3/5/1997--Introduced. Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to mandate that disclosure documents accompanying any proxy, consent, or authorization solicited by an issuer of registered securities prior to a shareholder meeting include a disclosure of the issuer's charitable contributions during the preceding fiscal year, including the identity of each recipient and the amount provided.
